title: Iran's nuclear progam: UN nuclear watchdog leaders return to Tehran after war with Israel
subhead: This is the first visit by the International Atomic Energy Agency since the 12-day war with Israel in June. Weakened and deprived of its regional allies, Iran is making a gesture in favor of negotiations.

title: Why Russia's economy is beginning to falter
subhead: Hit by falling oil revenues and Western sanctions, growth in the country has slowed while the budget deficit has exploded.
byline: By Marie Jégo and Benjamin Quénelle

title: Taylor Swift announces 12th album 'The Life of a Showgirl' for 'pre pre-order'
subhead: This is the follow-up to Swift's last studio album, 'The Tortured Poets Department,' which was released last year and sold 1.4 million copies the first day.  A disclaimer on her site notes that the album's release date has not yet been announced, and but that it will ship before October 13.

title: Casablanca has become a safe haven for sub-Saharan migrants
subhead: Morocco's economic capital welcomes many immigrants from West Africa. Confronted with growing barriers to reaching Europe, some have chosen to settle in this metropolis, where they are 'tolerated.'
